tool_description: Calculates the required amount of yarn needed for a project based on dimensions, stitch gauge, and yarn specifications.

project_type.description: Type of project (sweater, scarf, blanket, hat, socks, mittens, shawl)

finished_dimensions.description: Project dimensions in inches [width, length, height if applicable]

yarn_weight_category.description: Standard yarn weight (lace, light, DK, worsted, chunky, super_chunky)

stitch_gauge.description: Stitches per inch in stockinette stitch

row_gauge.description: Rows per inch in stockinette stitch

error_messages: Invalid project type: Use recognized project types like sweater, scarf, blanket, hat, socks, mittens, or shawl.
Invalid dimensions: Dimensions must be positive numbers. Provide [width, length] or [width, length, height] in inches.
Unsupported yarn weight: Use standard categories: lace, light, DK, worsted, chunky, or super_chunky.
Invalid gauge measurements: Stitch gauge and row gauge must be positive numbers greater than 0.
usage: Specify project_type, finished_dimensions as an array, yarn_weight_category, stitch_gauge, and row_gauge. The tool calculates total yarn requirements with recommended extra allowance for the project type.

recommended_extra_percentage.description: Suggested extra yarn percentage for this project type

total_with_extra.description: Total recommended yarn purchase including extra

estimated_skeins.description: Approximate number of standard skeins needed

calculation_method.description: Brief explanation of calculation approach used
